resources.string:
* Eat
 		1. Plenty of Proteins
 		2. Adequate amount of Carbs and Fat
 		3. Three meals per day (at least)
 		4. Take energy-dense foods and spices
 		
 * Food Suggestions
 		1. Nuts (Almonds, Walnuts, Peanuts)
 		2. Dried Fruit (Raisins, Dates)
 		3. High-fat diary (Whole Milk, nonfat yoghurt)
 		4. Grains ( Oats, Brown rice)
 		5. Meat and Fish
 		6. Tubers (Potatoes, Sweet potatoes)
 		7. Dark chocolate
 		8. Avocados
 		9. Coconut Milk
 		10.Peanut butter

* Eat
 		1. Less cholesterol and less fat products
				(canola Oil, Olive Oil), Also avoid less saturated 
				and less trans-fat products.
 		2. More fruits, Vegetables.
 		3. Whole grains. Also avoid foods that high in 
				sugar like pastries, soda and flavored drinks.
 		4. Non-fat dairy products.
 		5. Eating 5 smaller meals than eating 3 larger ones.
